name: Example2

description: This example have four circles with sertain colors but it makes the diameter grow and then decrese between 10 and 70.

name: Molnar recreation
description: This is a recreation of the molar example but I made it that the shape is smaller as the 'i' increases; the variance is also calculated based on the half of the size of each shape.

name: Molnar2
description: This variation gives a purple color to the shapes and encludes a loop that creates an animation.

name: Noise3

name: Drone show
description: The project will present a sequence of rotating circles to create different forms, simulating a drone light show. The images observed from the ground in drone light shows serve as inspiration. This will be done by using JavaScript and the p5.js package to create dynamic and generative art. To create a changing visual experience, I should play with grid layout, rotation, and animation using the code.
